Text:
you're welcome arrowgreen426.

i forgot to include a reading order / explanation:
1. read Justice League #193 from the extras
2. read Squadron #1-13
3. read Crisis on Earth Prime from the extras
4. read Squadron #16-67

as for the annuals, sorry everyone i dunno - i'm sure they fit in somewhere! lol
One of the best DC series from the 80's, thank you so much for this !  :)

One of the annuals ties in with Crisis on Infinite Earths.  I tried to send arrowgreen the link from h33t, for this torrent, but it kept saying database error when I attempted to submit it...

Sorry ArrowGreen, I tried..STFMary usually responds in kind, and quickly too

thanks BSnapp, yeah TPB doesn't let you post certain links, that's what the database error means. i'm glad you said that though, because i had found these on filestube but i should've looked on h33t. it would've saved time.

For anyone curious: these are the same old scans that have been in circulation for ten years or more. Not new rips from the cleaned-up digital publication.

Thank you to all seeders!
